description: Can only be used by the Ocelot. Allows it to perform the sneak and pounce attack.

sneak_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the sneaking speed. 1.0 means the ocelot will move at the speed it normally sneaks.

sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the running speed of this mob while using this attack.

walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the walking speed while using this attack.
